attributes.action: Remove Kroenke from position of Arsenal owner.
attributes.additional_details: Most if not all Arsenal fans dislike Kroenke and his cheap spending has been shown again in this current window with players like Ousmane Dembele, Radja Naingglan and Kalidou Koulibaly all linked but money not spent. We want to win but we won’t with Stan Kroenke.
attributes.background: Stan Kroenke is the owner of Arsenal Football Club. He took over in 2011 since then Arsenal haven’t won a single Premier League or European cup. Kroenke invests 0 into the club meaning we spend much less to our rivals. He uses the money to buy islands and ranches, this needs to stop,
